channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Test & Purchase OnPrem It is not necessary to purchase the app, as it is only suitable for existing customers who used a system up to BC14, already used Connector NAV/BC on it and then switched to a newer system with Connector 365 apps. For this customer group, the use of the app is included in the maintenance costs. A test phase is therefore also unnecessary, especially as the app is ideally only used once.
